import os
os.environ['PYSPARK_SUBMIT_ARGS'] = '--packages com.datastax.spark:spark-cassandra-connector_2.11:2.3.0 --conf spark.cassandra.connection.host=10.0.1.4 pyspark-shell'
from pyspark import SparkContext
sc = SparkContext("local", "thegym")
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
sqlContext = SQLContext(sc)
def load_and_get_table_df(keys_space_name, table_name):
    table_df = sqlContext.read\
        .format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra")\
        .options(table=table_name, keyspace=keys_space_name)\
        .load()
    return table_df
hr = load_and_get_table_df("thegym", "hr")
hr.show()
